summary: Completed comprehensive testing of bulk email validator with user authentication and Stripe integration. All core features working perfectly including user registration, login, dashboard functionality, email validation, and pricing plans display.

design_issues.issue: NaN value briefly displayed in 'Remaining' field before proper value loads

passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responds correctly
User registration API creates accounts successfully
User login API authenticates correctly
User profile API returns correct user data
Pricing plans API returns all 3 plans (Free, Basic, Pro)
Authenticated single email validation works
Authenticated bulk email validation creates jobs
CSV upload validation processes files
Job status retrieval shows progress and results
Job export functionality generates CSV files
List jobs API returns user's validation history
Registration page loads with proper form fields
Registration flow successfully creates account and redirects to dashboard
Login page loads with proper form fields
Login flow successfully authenticates and redirects to dashboard
Dashboard loads for authenticated users with usage stats
Dashboard email validation form accepts multiple emails
Email validation successfully processes and redirects to results
Results page displays validation summary and detailed results table
Pricing page displays all 3 plans with correct pricing and features
Pricing page shows subscribe buttons for paid plans
Protected routes correctly redirect unauthenticated users to login
